description.displayText: Desireé was a no call no show for an interview with my husband and I. Desireé confirmed the time the morning of, but didn't show at the time planned and Desireé didn't call/text to let us know she was unable to make it. Instead, led us to believe we were expecting her when she could have cancelled. I wish we didn't waste our evening waiting to meet Desireé.
description.originalText: Desireé was a no call no show for an interview with my husband and I. Desireé confirmed the time the morning of, but didn't show at the time planned and Desireé didn't call/text to let us know she was unable to make it. Instead, led us to believe we were expecting her when she could have cancelled. I wish we didn't waste our evening waiting to meet Desireé.

description.displayText: Desiree was very tenderhearted with my toddler. She was patient and kind and conveyed that she was very knowledgeable regarding appropriate care. I would love to hire Desiree again!
description.originalText: Desiree was very tenderhearted with my toddler. She was patient and kind and conveyed that she was very knowledgeable regarding appropriate care. I would love to hire Desiree again!

description.displayText: Desiree is great! We are new to area and needed someone to watch our daughter one evening. Our daughter had fun and didn't want her to leave. Desiree is genuine, down to earth, and quick with responding to messages. We will definitely be calling her again soon!
description.originalText: Desiree is great! We are new to area and needed someone to watch our daughter one evening. Our daughter had fun and didn't want her to leave. Desiree is genuine, down to earth, and quick with responding to messages. We will definitely be calling her again soon!

description.displayText: I have hired Desiree on several occasions. She has taken care of my 8 year old son and 3 year old daughter. I was afraid my children would give her a hard time or act out. She was very patient and tolerant to their difficult ways. I was completely surprised of how much my children had enjoyed spending time with her. Due to them not getting along well with other sitters in the past. She is also a very good cook. So dinner was prepared instead of ordering out which I LOVED but was not a requested duty from her. I highly recommend Desiree to anyone as a sitter. She is the best.
description.originalText: I have hired Desiree on several occasions. She has taken care of my 8 year old son and 3 year old daughter. I was afraid my children would give her a hard time or act out. She was very patient and tolerant to their difficult ways. I was completely surprised of how much my children had enjoyed spending time with her. I highly recommend Desiree to anyone as a sitter. She is the best.

description.displayText: I have known Desiree for a little over five years now. Desiree is such a humble down to earth person with such positive energy and always a pleasure to be around. I recently just asked Desiree to be the godmother of my 3-year-old daughter. They truly adore each other. Desiree has stood with my child overnight on many occasions in which all I have is positive feed back. She is extremely child oriented and has the gift of patience for children, she interacts with her so well that even when we are home all she says is (desiway), I wouldn't have it any other way. This is my personal experience with Desiree and my amazing 3-year-old daughter. Thank you for your time. I hope that other parents would take Desiree into consideration.

description.displayText: I am pleased that my daughter used me as a reference for an opportunity for employment. Desiree comes from a family of four and she is the oldest of the four. She is five years older than my son and ten years older than my twin daughters. Desiree is a wonderful, articulate, intelligent, delightful, beautiful and amazing person to know. She is always willing and able to help others. Desiree has always been very attentive to her sisters and brother as well as people in general. She has a beautiful 4-year-old goddaughter that she plays an important role in her life even though she relocated to North Carolina. She is very involved in her life physically, emotionally and mentally. She has a lot of cousins that are all younger then her because she is also the first grandchild. She has helped in more ways then one from changing pampers, to giving baths, to reading books, taking them to the park or laying back and watching TV. Not to be so personal but Desiree was not only a sister to her twin sisters that came from my second marriage but played a father role in their lives. My best friend just asked Desiree if she would take the honor of baptizing her daughter as well. Desiree is such a delight to be around and I don't say that because she is my child but because it's the truth. Once you meet her you will see for yourself what a pleasant individual she is. She is very loving and compassionate. I pat myself and her father on the back for raising such an amazing daughter. Desiree graduated from a Culinary Institute located in Manhattan and graduated from Queensboro College. Desiree majored in Liberal Arts to just getting accepted to quite a few top colleges. She chose to go to Hunter to further her education in Social Work for abused children. I am so proud of her and I am so proud to call her my daughter. All I ask is to set up an appointment to meet her and you won't regret it.
